content.json: >**NOTE:** This workbook depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**ExtraHopDetections**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-ExtraHopDetections-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections
| where IsRecommended == true | count
content.title: Recommended Detections

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections
| count
content.title: Total Detections

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections
| summarize MaximumRiskScore=max(RiskScore)
content.title: Maximum Risk Score

content.json: #### Click on the sections in the above panel **Recommended Detections** to view more information.
#### Click on the sections in the above panel **Total Detections** to view more information.
#### Click on the sections in the above panel **Maximum Risk Score** to view more information.

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections
| where IsRecommended = true 
| extend SourceDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(SourceDeviceIpAddress), ","), DestinationDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(DestinationDeviceIpAddress), ","),
CategoriesIds = strcat_array(todynamic(CategoriesIds), ","),
Categories = strcat_array(todynamic(Categories), ","),
TechniqueIds = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueIds), ","),
TechniqueNames = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueNames), ",")
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, Title, IsRecommended
content.title: Details of Recommended Detections

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections
| extend SourceDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(SourceDeviceIpAddress), ","), DestinationDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(DestinationDeviceIpAddress), ","),
CategoriesIds = strcat_array(todynamic(CategoriesIds), ","),
Categories = strcat_array(todynamic(Categories), ","),
TechniqueIds = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueIds), ","),
TechniqueNames = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueNames), ",")
content.title: Details of Detections

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections
| where RiskScore == ('{MaximumRiskScore}')
| extend SourceDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(SourceDeviceIpAddress), ","), DestinationDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(DestinationDeviceIpAddress), ","),
CategoriesIds = strcat_array(todynamic(CategoriesIds), ","),
Categories = strcat_array(todynamic(Categories), ","),
TechniqueIds = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueIds), ","),
TechniqueNames = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueNames), ",")
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, Title, RiskScore
content.title: Details of Detections with Risk Score: {MaximumRiskScore}

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections 
| where IsRecommended = true
| summarize Count = count() by Title | project-rename  ["Detection Title"] = Title
content.title: Recommended Detections

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections
| mv-expand todynamic(CategoriesIds) |  summarize Count = count() by tostring(CategoriesIds) | top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Detection Categories

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections
| mv-expand todynamic(TechniqueNames)
| summarize Count=count() by tostring(TechniqueNames)
| project-rename ["MITRE Category"] = TechniqueNames
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top MITRE Techniques

content.json: #### Click on the sections in the above panel **Recommended Detections** to view more information.
#### Click on the sections in the above panel **Top Detection Categories** to view more information.
#### Click on the sections in the above panel **Top MITRE Techniques** to view more information.

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections
| where Title == ('{DetectionTitle}')
| extend SourceDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(SourceDeviceIpAddress), ","), DestinationDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(DestinationDeviceIpAddress), ","),
CategoriesIds = strcat_array(todynamic(CategoriesIds), ","),
Categories = strcat_array(todynamic(Categories), ","),
TechniqueIds = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueIds), ","),
TechniqueNames = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueNames), ",")
content.title: Details of Detection for {DetectionTitle}

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections
| where CategoriesIds has_any ("{CategoryId}") 
| extend SourceDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(SourceDeviceIpAddress), ","), DestinationDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(DestinationDeviceIpAddress), ","),
CategoriesIds = strcat_array(todynamic(CategoriesIds), ","),
Categories = strcat_array(todynamic(Categories), ","),
TechniqueIds = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueIds), ","),
TechniqueNames = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueNames), ",")
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, Title, CategoriesIds, Categories
content.title: Details of Detections for Category ID: {CategoryId}

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections
| where TechniqueNames has_any ("{MITRECategory}")
| extend SourceDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(SourceDeviceIpAddress), ","), DestinationDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(DestinationDeviceIpAddress), ","),
CategoriesIds = strcat_array(todynamic(CategoriesIds), ","),
Categories = strcat_array(todynamic(Categories), ","),
TechniqueIds = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueIds), ","),
TechniqueNames = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueNames), ",")
| project-rename ["MITRETechniqueNames"] = TechniqueNames
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, Title, MITRETechniqueNames
content.title: Details of {MITRECategory} MITRE Category

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections
| summarize Count=count() by SourceHostname
| project-rename ["Host"] = SourceHostname
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Sources

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections
| summarize Count=count() by DestinationHostname
| project-rename ["Host"] = DestinationHostname
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Destinations

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections 
| summarize Count = count() by SourceHostname, DestinationHostname
content.title: Sources and Destinations

content.json: #### Click on the sections in the above panel **Top Sources** to view more information.
#### Click on the sections in the above panel **Top Destinations** to view more information.
#### Click on the sections in the above panel **Sources and Destinations** to view more information.

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections
| where SourceHostname == ("{SourceHostname}") 
| extend SourceDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(SourceDeviceIpAddress), ","), DestinationDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(DestinationDeviceIpAddress), ","),
CategoriesIds = strcat_array(todynamic(CategoriesIds), ","),
Categories = strcat_array(todynamic(Categories), ","),
TechniqueIds = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueIds), ","),
TechniqueNames = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueNames), ",")
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, Title, SourceHostname
content.title: Details of {SourceHostname} Source

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections
| where DestinationHostname == ("{DestinationHostname}") 
| extend SourceDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(SourceDeviceIpAddress), ","), DestinationDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(DestinationDeviceIpAddress), ","),
CategoriesIds = strcat_array(todynamic(CategoriesIds), ","),
Categories = strcat_array(todynamic(Categories), ","),
TechniqueIds = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueIds), ","),
TechniqueNames = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueNames), ",")
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, Title, DestinationHostname
content.title: Details of {DestinationHostname} Destination

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections 
| where SourceHostname == ("{SourceHostName}")  and DestinationHostname == ("{DestinationHostName}")
| extend SourceDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(SourceDeviceIpAddress), ","), DestinationDeviceIpAddress = strcat_array(todynamic(DestinationDeviceIpAddress), ","),
CategoriesIds = strcat_array(todynamic(CategoriesIds), ","),
Categories = strcat_array(todynamic(Categories), ","),
TechniqueIds = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueIds), ","),
TechniqueNames = strcat_array(todynamic(TechniqueNames), ",")
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, Title, SourceHostname, DestinationHostname
content.title: Details of {SourceHostName} and {DestinationHostName}

content.query:
ExtraHopDetections
| sort by TimeGenerated
| extend CategoriesIds = strcat_array(todynamic(CategoriesIds), ",")
| project  TimeGenerated, ["Detection ID"] = Id, ["Risk Score"] = RiskScore, ["Detection Title"] = Title, ["Categories"] = CategoriesIds, 
["Source Host"] = SourceHostname, ["Destination Host"] = DestinationHostname, ["Detection Generated Time"] = DateTime, ["Detection URL"] = Url
content.title: Recent Detections

content.json: ðŸ“ **Refresh the web page to fetch details of recently collected events**
>This dashboard shows Microsoft Sentinel Security Alerts data for ExtraHop by various views.

parameters.name: AlertSeverity
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert
| summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity
| order by Count desc, AlertSeverity asc
| project Value = AlertSeverity, Label = strcat(AlertSeverity, ' - ', Count)
parameters.label: Alert Severity

parameters.name: MITRETechnique
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName == "ExtraHop"
| mv-expand MITRETechnique = todynamic(Techniques)
| distinct tostring(MITRETechnique)
| sort by tostring(MITRETechnique)
parameters.label: MITRE Technique

parameters.name: MITRETactic
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName == "ExtraHop"
| extend Tactics_list = split(Tactics, ", ")
| mv-expand Tactics = Tactics_list
| where isnotempty(Tactics)
| distinct tostring(Tactics)
| sort by Tactics asc
parameters.label: MITRE Tactic

content.query:
let data = SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:label}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{MITRETactic:label}" == "All" or Tactics contains ('{MITRETactic}')
| where"{MITRETechnique:label}" == "All" or Techniques has_any ('{MITRETechnique}')
| where ProductName == "ExtraHop";
data
| summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by AlertSeverity)
 on AlertSeverity
 | project-away TimeGenerated
| extend AlertSeveritys = AlertSeverity
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend AlertSeverity = 'All', AlertSeveritys = '*' 
)
| extend Severity = iif(AlertSeverity == "All", 0,iif(AlertSeverity == "High", 1, iif(AlertSeverity == "Medium", 2, iif(AlertSeverity == "Low", 3, 4))))
| order by Severity asc
content.title: Security Alerts by Severity
Security Alerts Over Time by Severity

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:label}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{MITRETactic:label}" == "All" or Tactics contains ('{MITRETactic}')
| where"{MITRETechnique:label}" == "All" or Techniques has_any ('{MITRETechnique}')
| where ProductName == "ExtraHop"
| where AlertSeverity == '{AlertSeverityPicker}' or '{AlertSeverityPicker}' == "All"
| extend Entities = iff(isempty(Entities), todynamic('[{"dummy" : ""}]'), todynamic(Entities))
| mvexpand Entities
| evaluate bag_unpack(Entities, "Entity_")
| extend Entity_Type = columnifexists("Entity_Type", "")
| extend Entity_Name = columnifexists("Entity_Name", "")
| extend Entity_ResourceId = columnifexists("Entity_ResourceId", "")
| extend Entity_Directory = columnifexists("Entity_Directory", "")
| extend Entity_Value = columnifexists("Entity_Value", "")
| extend Entity_HostName = columnifexists("Entity_HostName", "")
| extend Entity_Address = columnifexists("Entity_Address", "")
| extend Entity_ProcessId = columnifexists("Entity_ProcessId", "")
| extend Entity_Url = columnifexists("Entity_Url", "")
| extend Target = iif(Entity_Type == "account", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "azure-resource", Entity_ResourceId, iif(Entity_Type == "cloud-application", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "dns", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "file", strcat(Entity_Directory, "\\", Entity_Name), iif(Entity_Type == "filehash", Entity_Value, iif(Entity_Type == "host", Entity_HostName, iif(Entity_Type == "ip" , Entity_Address, iif(Entity_Type == "malware", Entity_HostName, iif(Entity_Type == "network-connection", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "process", Entity_ProcessId, iif(Entity_Type == "registry-key", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "registry-value", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "security-group", Entity_Name, iif(Entity_Type == "url", Entity_Url, "NoTarget")))))))))))))))
| where Entity_Type in ("account", "host", "ip", "url", "azure-resource", "cloud-application", "dns", "file", "filehash", "malware", "network-connection", "process", "registry-key", "registry-value", "security-group")
| summarize Count = count() by Target, Entity_Type
| order by Count desc
content.title: Top Entities in Security Alerts

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:label}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{MITRETactic:label}" == "All" or Tactics contains ('{MITRETactic}')
| where"{MITRETechnique:label}" == "All" or Techniques has_any ('{MITRETechnique}')
| where ProductName == "ExtraHop"
| where AlertSeverity == '{AlertSeverityPicker}' or '{AlertSeverityPicker}' == "All"
| extend Entities = iff(isempty(Entities), todynamic('[{"dummy" : ""}]'), todynamic(Entities))
| mvexpand Entities
| evaluate bag_unpack(Entities, "Entity_")
| extend Entity_Type = columnifexists("Entity_Type", "")
| where Entity_Type in ("account", "alerts", "azure-resource", "cloud-application", "dns", "file", "filehash", "host", "host-logon-session", "ip", "malware", "network-connection", "process", "registry-key", "registry-value", "security-group", "SrvSvcSessionEntry", "url")
| summarize count() by Entity_Type
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Count of Entities in Security Alerts by Type

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:label}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{MITRETactic:label}" == "All" or Tactics contains ('{MITRETactic}')
| where "{MITRETechnique:label}" == "All" or Techniques has_any ('{MITRETechnique}')
| where ProductName == "ExtraHop"
| mv-expand todynamic(Techniques)
| where "{MITRETechnique:label}" == "All" or Techniques == '{MITRETechnique}'
| summarize Count=count() by tostring(Techniques)
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Top MITRE Techniques in Security Alerts

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:label}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{MITRETactic:label}" == "All" or Tactics contains ('{MITRETactic}')
| where"{MITRETechnique:label}" == "All" or Techniques has_any ('{MITRETechnique}')
| where ProductName == "ExtraHop"
| extend Tactics_list = split(Tactics, ", ")
| mv-expand Tactics = Tactics_list
| where isnotempty(Tactics)
| where "{MITRETactic:label}" == "All" or Tactics == ('{MITRETactic}')
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(Tactics)
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Top MITRE Tactics in Security Alerts
